sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-hotspot
      :init-options="hotspotConfig"
      @save-data="saveData"
      @after-delete="afterDelete" />
</template>

<script>
import VueHotspot from 'vue-hotspot';

export default {
  components: {
      'v-hotspot': VueHotspot
  },
  props: {
      hotspots: {
          type: Array,
          required: true
      }
  },
  data () {
      return {
          hotspotConfig: {
              // Use the hotspots data passed from the parent component
              data: this.hotspots,
              // Other configuration options...
          }
      }
  },
  methods: {
      saveData (data) {
          // Emit event to notify parent component about updated hotspot data
          this.$emit('hotspots-updated', data);
      },
      afterDelete () {
          // Do something after delete
          console.log('Do something after delete ...');
      }
  }
}
</script>
